Lukt het niet om een melding te doen? Be: Having trouble submitting a report? Call the phone number +4500000000.
configuration-language-siteaddress-heeft: {configuration.language.siteAddress} does not have permission to use your location.
controleer-uw-gegevens-en-verstuur-uw-me: Check your details and submit your report.
daarna-kunt-u-de-filteropties-gebruiken: Then you can use the filter options
de-adressen-konden-niet-worden-opgehaald: The addresses could not be retrieved.
de-standaardteksten-konden-niet-worden-o: The standard texts could not be retrieved.
dit-kunt-u-wijzigen-in-de-voorkeuren-of-: You can change this in the preferences or settings of your browser or system.
een-uiting-van-ongenoegen-over-het-hande: An expression of dissatisfaction about the actions of the municipality.
een-verzoek-dat-niet-onder-dagelijks-beh: A request that does not fall under daily management, but under a long-term process.
A request that does not fall under daily management, but under a project.
een-verzoek-om-iets-structureels-te-vera: A request to change something structurally (placement of a bench, moving a container, etc.).
een-verzoek-om-informatie-van-wie-is-die: A request for information (who owns the camera, why were the posts removed, etc.).
een-verzoek-tot-herstel-of-handhaving-om: A request for recovery or enforcement to restore the normal situation (container full, noise pollution, speeding, etc.).
ga-naar-and-lsquo-filter-and-rsquo-en-vo: To save a filter setting, go to "Filter" and enter a name.
geef-deze-filterinstelling-een-naam-om-d: Give this filter setting a name to save it
hoe-komt-de-melding-binnen: How does the report come in?
hoofdmelding-met-wijziging-in-deelmeldin: Main notification with change in sub-notification
hoofdmelding-zonder-wijziging-in-deelmel: Main notification without change in sub-notification
ja-ik-geef-de-gemeente-toestemming-om-mi: Yes, I give the municipality permission to forward my report to other organizations if the report is not intended for the municipality.
let-op-het-sorteren-is-niet-gelukt: Please note, the sorting was not successful
locatie-is-gepind-op-de-kaart: Location is pinned on the map.
lukt-het-niet-om-een-melding-te-doen-bel: Having trouble submitting a report? Call the phone number +4500000000
mogen-we-u-bellen-voor-vragen-en-op-de-h: May we call you for questions? And keep you updated via email?
om-deze-pagina-te-zien-dient-u-ingelogd-: To view this page, you need to be logged in.
soms-kan-de-gemeente-niets-doen-een-ande: Sometimes the municipality cannot take action. Another organization may need to address the issue. If that is the case, we may forward your report. We will include your phone number or email address, but only if you give us permission.
typ-geen-persoonsgegevens-in-deze-omschr: Do not enter personal data in this description. We will ask for it later in this form.
typ-het-dichtstbijzijnde-adres-klik-de-l: Type the nearest address, click the location on the map, or use "My location".
u-hebt-niet-alle-vragen-beantwoord-vul-h: You have not answered all the questions. Please complete the fields below.
u-hebt-niet-alle-vragen-invalid-beantwoo: You have not answered all the questions{{invalid}}. Please complete the fields below.
u-hebt-niet-alle-vragen-juist-beantwoord: You have not answered all the questions (correctly). Please complete the fields below.
u-heeft-geen-eigen-filter-opgeslagen: You have not saved your own filter.
u-heeft-meer-dan-de-maximale-maxlength-t: You have entered more than the maximum {{maxLength}} characters.
u-heeft-meer-dan-de-maximale-string-gete: You have entered more than the maximum {{requiredLength}} characters.
uw-locatie-valt-buiten-de-kaart-en-is-da: Your location is outside the map and therefore not visible.
uw-melding-is-bij-ons-bekend-onder-numme:
Your report is registered with us under number: {incident.id_display}.
 Did you provide an email address? Then you will receive an email with all the details of your report.

Your report is registered with us under number: [{incident.id_display}](/manage/incident/{incident.id}).
 Did you provide an email address? Then you will receive an email with all the details of your report.
vaak-hebben-we-nog-een-vraag-daarmee-kun:
Often, we still have a question. This helps us solve the problem faster or better. Or we may want to explain something. We would like to call you in that case. Otherwise, we will email you.
 We will use your phone number and email address **only** for this report.
verwijder-eerst-uw-zoekopdracht-om-de-fi: First delete your search to use the filter options
voeg-een-foto-toe-om-de-situatie-te-verd: Add a photo to clarify the situation
vul-een-geldig-e-mailadres-in-met-een-en: Enter a valid email address, including an @ and a domain name. For example: name@domain.com
wat-doen-we-met-uw-melding: What do we do with your report?
weet-je-zeker-dat-je-dit-filter-wilt-ver: Are you sure you want to delete this filter? This cannot be undone.
wij-zijn-bereikbaar-van-maandag-tot-en-m: We are available Monday through Friday from 08:00 to 18:00.
wilt-u-nog-een-andere-melding-doen: Would you like to make another report?
